TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 1. buy some large model rocket engines then strap them a shopping cart and start them
2. Ride a bike dangerously fast in walmart with lit Fireworks strapped to it.
3. Grab 2 bottles of chocolate milk and spill it on the ground, then swim in it
4. Ask where they sell the child sweat shop workers. (to cruel?)

5

Release all of the giant rubber balls

6

Bring a big bag and start filling it with free food samples.
7. Create a modern art sculpture out of the cans and glue.
8. Tell the staff to kick you out.
do the flop until you are kicked out
10: Trick a cashier that someone wants them for something and use the loudspeaker when they run off.
11. Reenact the "This is Sparta!" scene with the cash register.
12. Reenact the "This is Sparta!" scene with the stacked cans.
13. Crash a SRB into Walmart.
14 . Forget to bring money.
15. Declare yourself to be god.
16. declare yourself to be jesus and start filling the wine section with your own blood.
17. Reenact scenes from Hot Fuzz in Walmart with those shopping for goods.
18. Turn all the water into wine with your jesus powers

19: Go into all of the "Employee only zones" and knock over stacked goods and cause confusion and delay...

Edited May 31, 2013 by ZedNova
20.stand in front of the exit and ask people if they want to donate to the church of srbs, if they give you money give them model rocket engines if not don't let them leave until they give you money
21. Get hired at Walmart and fire yourself/quit.
22. Ride one of the bikes on display around and around.
23. Reenact the film "Triumph of the Will" in costume.
Purchase a tent in camping, and then put it up in electronics, with the cover story that your waiting for half life 3 (boxed edition).

purchase a tent in camping, and then put it up in electronics, with the cover story that your waiting for half life 3 (boxed edition).

winner!!!!
